messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey Tah-Kepanuu, I would appreciate if the bomb didn't go off near medbay or my office, thaanks. I request nicely that you space the thing, up to you. just a suggestion

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Patrooling thee Mojahahahve  almost mahkech yoooooo wish ffor a nucl'eahr  winter

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Shuttle Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a swarm of squeaking things have swarmed into the maintenance areas.
